articles.title: About Me
articles.description: I'm Isabelle and I'm from San Diego, California. I'm a senior at GWU, majoring in Journalism and Mass Communication and minoring in Criminal Justice.

articles.title: Experience
articles.description: Here is a list of my work experience.
articles.contents:
Work Experience
Hebrew Free Loan of San Diego - Social Media Intern
Responsibilities:
Managing day-to-day posting on social accounts and scheduling posts via Hootsuite (Facebook, LinkedIn, Instagram)
Developing brand creative and awareness through designing graphics for all social accounts
Monitoring account analytics for all social accounts including follower growth and engagement; increased Instagram following by 20% over a 3-week period
Writing copy for social media posts
Strategizing overall page aesthetics to lead to successful content development
Idlehour Vineyard - Social Media Manager (freelance)
Responsibilities:
Developing new Instagram account for Idlehour
Overseeing photography and curating images for social media
InterContinental New York Barclay - Sales & Marketing Intern
Responsibilities:
Assistant to Director of Marketing
Collaborated with team to develop high impact digital marketing strategies and campaigns
Wrote copy and created graphics for weekly/monthly specials and promotions
Assisted with brand photography
Managed expense reports, daily tasks, and created PowerPoint presentations for executive meetings
& Other Stories - Sales Ambassador
Responsibilities:
Worked with fashion and management teams to drive overall sales goals
Communicated with and assisted customers with returns, purchasing, in-store needs
Planned and organized store layouts and processed early deliveries to maximize store efficiency

articles.title: Podcast
articles.description: Here is a link to the class website that I helped create in my Journalism Capstone Course at GWU. I created a politics and a social justice podcast. The politics podcast is called "Capital Current - Unpacking QAnon" and my social justice podcast is called "Capital Current - Unpacking Gentrification"

articles.title: Skills
articles.description: Here is a list of my skills.
articles.contents:
My skills include:
Microsoft Office Suite
Adobe Creative Cloud (Spark, Photoshop, Illustrator, Audition, Premiere Pro)
Hootsuite
Canva
Content Management
Brand Development
Marketing Strategy

articles.title: Video
articles.description: This is a video project I created in my senior capstone Journalism course. The video is about CSOs and their harm to the Potomac River and surrounding populations.

articles.title: Writing
articles.description: This is a writing piece I collaborated on for a social media class while I was studying abroad in Sydney, Australia.
